alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 3:32AM AKST until January 29 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow occurring. Plan on difficult travel conditions with reduced visibility to a half mile or less at times. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches are expected. * WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range including Isabel Pass and Mentasta Pass. * WHEN...Until 6 PM Saturday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Look for reduced visibilities at times. North winds gusting to 40 mph from Trims Camp south will result in significant blowing and drifting snow at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
